comments:
Isaac Segal game 5.
First game of Season 12.

clues.text: The last monarch crowned in this church was Elizabeth II

He organized the corps of men who photographed the Civil War; poor eyesight limited his work

clues.text: When joining copper water pipes, use solder free of this heavy metal once commonly used in plumbing

rounds.text: Other than in Germany, the U.S. has more military personnel stationed in this foreign country than in any other
